title: Battle of the Temple of Melkor: Stand of the Black Númenóreans - Third Age Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
The Temple of Melkor was built by the Black Númenóreans many years ago.  But today the Temple finds itself surrounded by an alliance of Men and Elves.  Their mission is to stop the spread of the Elder King's teachings and destroyed the Black Númenóreans army.  This is a custom scenario made by Synn of the Dark cloud.  Enjoy the Battle :D

Third Age: Reforged is a Sub Mod for Third Age Total War which is a mod for Medieval 2 Total War.
Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/third-age-reforged

Reforged Discord Link: https://discordapp.com/invite/rnNXfDd  


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
